session: Doors Open; Coffee/Tea; Distribute customer swag

speaker: David Walker
session: What is a Distributed Database? - Take one home today

speaker: Karl Funk
session: Session 1: Non Stop Transactions in the face of disaster
message: Live demonstration showing a Banking Application with a central database for ledger management. We will show how the central database can survive an Availability Zone or even a Region failure. We then extend the use case to include an Edge Computing use case.

speaker:
Dave Roberts
Doug Hadfield
session: Session 2: Stopping the sky falling in? Building and operating clusters for resilience
message: Live demonstration showing how to build a distributed database

speaker: Drinks & Food
message: Plug-in to our engineers, Play with the technology whilst you enjoy a drink and a snack
We will be continuing in a bar near by
